author: Special Correspondent
text:
Three members of a family travelling in a car died after the vehicle and a goods carrier collided head-on on the Tiruchi-Karur national highway at Sirugamani near here on Thursday.

The victims hailed from Chalakudy near Thrissur in Kerala. Police said a family of four were proceeding in the car to Velankanni from Kerala when the vehicle and a goods carrier that came in the opposite direction collided. Three occupants George (44), his daughter Libiya (21) and Aju died.

Sheela, wife of George, sustained severe injury and is undergoing treatment in a private hospital here. The Pettavaithalai police have registered a case.
title: Three of family die as car, goods carrier collide
